title: Trying to id this font if it's actually a font.
content:
Does anyone have any idea what the name of this font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016033747im_/http:/typophile.com/files/storm_4596.png)

Thank you in advance.
author: gemmasan

comments.content: Because there are no repeating characters, it's difficult to tell whether or not it's a font…although I tend to think not.
Thanks for the response. It's like I've seen that "R" from somewhere else. I just can't put my finger on it.

No match. But if you are mainly interested in the R, there is some hope. R looks sort of Sci-Fi or techno -- you could go through IconianFonts or the Sci-Fi /Techno themes at Dafont & see if there is anything close enough for you to like -- or comic book, which you could check through at Blambot.  
Don
